snippet: Albuquerque police officers shot and killed a suspect on Tuesday who they said pulled a gun on them after a foot chase.
abstract: Albuquerque police shoot and kill John Edward Okeefe after he fires stolen gun at officers; man was wearing sheriff-issued body armor.
lead_paragraph: Albuquerque police officers shot and killed a suspect on Tuesday who they said pulled a gun on them after a foot chase.

headline.main: New Mexico: Albuquerque Police Kill Man Wearing Body Armor
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Albuquerque Police Kill Man Wearing Body Armor
